abstract: After meeting with top Citigroup executives, Michael Mayo, an analyst who has been an outspoken critic of the bank, released a report concluding that Citigroup was not likely to reclaim its glory days.
snippet: After meeting with top Citigroup executives, Michael Mayo, an analyst who has been an outspoken critic of the bank, released a report concluding that Citigroup was not likely to reclaim its glory days.
lead_paragraph: It is going to take more than a two-hour meeting with Citigroup executives to make a believer out of the financial analyst Michael Mayo, left.
